Name: Teacher Assistance Manager

CreationRequirements.InitialRequirement: im a teacher, have multiple groups and need help to manage the assistance list for each group. need to be able to create groups with students and need to generate an assistance list for the current day, at the end of the week I need a summary for the percentage os assitance per group
CreationRequirements.ReviewedRequirement: Design a software module to help teachers manage student attendance across multiple groups. The module should allow the teacher to create and manage groups of students, record daily attendance, and generate weekly attendance summaries. The teacher should be able to view and update attendance records for each group on a daily basis. At the end of the week, the module should automatically calculate and display the attendance percentage for each group. The system should ensure data integrity and provide an intuitive interface for the teacher to interact with the attendance records.
FunctionalDetails: Record daily attendance for each group
Provide an intuitive interface for teachers
UserInteraction: Teacher creates a new group and adds students to it
Teacher marks attendance for each student in a group on a daily basis
Teacher views the attendance record for a specific day
Teacher generates a weekly attendance summary for a group
Teacher views the attendance percentage for a group at the end of the week

MinimumFeatures.Description: Create, read, update, delete, and search (CRUDS) operations for groups
Create, read, update, delete, and search (CRUDS) operations for students
Calculate and display attendance percentages per group

GoodToHaveFeatures.Description: Export attendance records to a file (e.g., CSV, PDF)
Filter and sort attendance records by date, group, or student
Notify teacher of low attendance percentages

BarRaiserFeatures.Description: Predict attendance trends based on historical data
Integration with calendar systems to mark holidays and non-school days
Multi-teacher support with role-based access control
Mobile-friendly interface for attendance marking on-the-go

Description: Attendance management system for teachers with group/student CRUDS operations, daily attendance tracking, and weekly summary generation. Maintains JSON data stores for groups, students, attendances and summaries.
